channel.title: New section request
channel.description:
A lot of people complain about Winterlove based private servers, lately I have been trying to change this by releasing new servers that are a lot better than Current Winterlove servers. I have also released that other people are trying to do the same.
I am here to request a new private server section, or atleast a Download section for RS2D servers as Rs2D server don't get as much attention as they did before and hopefully we can change this. Please leave thoughts and comments on this.
[b]Please add a new private server section for Rs2D based private servers.[/b]

item.title: New section request
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

But it still doesn’t matter there are sections that cover all of those, and we do not need more.

[quote=“Natey, post:5, topic:284584”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=376050.msg2833729#msg2833729 date=1245515628]
It doesn’t matter how much more advanced Rs2D is over wL, they are both Rs2 Private Servers.
[/quote]I would personaly love to have a section for advanced coders/people wanting to learn Java[/quote]
Really?

Read full topic

item.title: New section request
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Spoon licking… That’s something you never hear…

Anyway, I’d say no. They’re both RSPS, and for the same deob. If someone actually wants to learn Java, then they’d move on to something else other than RSPS. RS2D may be complicated, but there’s much more Java can do.

Read full topic

item.title: New section request
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:4, topic:284584”]It doesn’t matter how much more advanced Rs2D is over wL, they are both Rs2 Private Servers.[/quote]I think he means thats Rs2d is more complicated than WL, and the new section (if it is to be) will be for people actually WANTING TO LEARN Java instead of leeching/spoon licking/spoon feeding/ etc; I would personaly love to have a new section for advanced coders/people wanting to learn Java a fun way instead of sitting infront of a screen for 2 months reading coding conventions over and over
Anyways I would love to have a new section, so I guess I support this?

Read full topic

item.title: New section request
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

It doesn’t matter how much more advanced Rs2D is over wL, they are both Rs2 Private Servers.

Read full topic

item.title: New section request
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

Telenim:

This isn’t needed as they are both Rs2 Private Servers and they are both related to the same thing.

I understand that, but the Rs2D server is far more well created than wL, I would like to see members of moparscape start learning about Java instead of spoon licking.

Read full topic
